compounddef.title: EPS Double Precision Floating Point Relative Machine Precision Epsilon

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Returns eps, which quantifies the relative machine precision of floating point numbers (a machine specific quantity). The syntax for eps is: y = eps y = eps('double') y = eps(X) First form returns eps for double precision values. For most typical processors, this value is approximately 2^-52, or 2.2204e-16. Second form return eps for class double or single. Third form returns distance to the next value greater than X.
